SELECT COUNT(boardType) FROM( SELECT boardType, freeNum as num, freeSubject as subject, freeCreated as created, userId FROM comFree UNION ALL SELECT boardType, dealNum as num, dealSubject as subject, dealCreated as created, userId FROM comDeal UNION ALL SELECT boardType, photoNum as num, photoSubject as subject, photoCreated as created, userId FROM comPhoto UNION ALL SELECT boardType, vidNum as num, vidSubject as subject, vidCreated as created, userId FROM vetVideo )
AND boardType=#{boardType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT DISTINCT(boardType) FROM( SELECT boardType FROM comFree UNION ALL SELECT boardType FROM comDeal UNION ALL SELECT boardType FROM comPhoto UNION ALL SELECT boardType FROM vetVideo )

SELECT NVL(COUNT(boardType),0) FROM( SELECT boardType, r.freeNum AS num, freeReplyNum AS replyNum, r.userId, freeReplyCreated AS created, freeReplyContent AS content FROM comFreeReply r JOIN comFree f ON f.freeNum=r.freeNum UNION ALL SELECT boardType, r.dealNum AS num, dealReplyNum AS replyNum, r.userId, dealReplyCreated AS created, dealReplyContent AS content FROM comDealReply r JOIN comDeal d ON d.dealNum=r.dealNum UNION ALL SELECT boardType, r.photoNum AS num, photoReplyNum AS replyNum, r.userId, photoReplyCreated AS created, photoReplyContent AS content FROM comPhotoReply r JOIN comPhoto p ON p.photoNum=r.photoNum UNION ALL SELECT boardType, r.vidNum AS num, vidReplyNum AS replyNum, r.userId, vidReplyCreated AS created, vidReplyContent AS content FROM vetVidReply r JOIN vetVideo v ON v.vidNum=r.vidNum )
AND boardType=#{boardType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(boardType),0) FROM ( SELECT num, boardType, articleNum, replyNum, userId, reportCode, memo, report_date, report_id FROM replyReport )
AND boardType=#{boardType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

WITH memberAge AS ( SELECT c.userId, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, userBirth)/12) age FROM comMember c JOIN comFree f ON f.userId=c.userId UNION ALL SELECT c.userId, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, userBirth)/12) age FROM comMember c JOIN comPhoto f ON f.userId=c.userId UNION ALL SELECT c.userId, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, userBirth)/12) age FROM comMember c JOIN comDeal f ON f.userId=c.userId UNION ALL SELECT c.userId, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, userBirth)/12) age FROM comMember c JOIN comMiss f ON f.userId=c.userId )
SELECT '기타' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age<10 OR age>70 UNION ALL SELECT '10대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age>=10 AND age<20 UNION ALL SELECT '20대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age>=20 AND age<30 UNION ALL SELECT '30대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age>=30 AND age<40 UNION ALL SELECT '40대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age>=40 AND age<50 UNION ALL SELECT '50대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age>=50 AND age<60 UNION ALL SELECT '60대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age>=60 AND age<70
